FuncDef: This command configures Dynamic Data Persistence (DDP) compact flash access optimization for DHCP leases.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the threshold in days. Values-0 to 7305.
Specifies the threshold in hours. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the threshold in minutes. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the threshold in seconds. Values-0 to 59.
